features: MR. BONES SUPER7 ACTION FIGURE: Vintage puzzle candy Mr. Bones joins the Super7 action toy figures lineup

FUN-READY ACCESSORIES: This action figure features the skeletal scamp in a patchwork of bright colors and comes with a tombstone accessory, allowing you to recreate the nostalgic candy treat of your childhood
3.75-INCH ACTION FIGURE: Mr Bones figure is in 3.75" scale with the rest of the Mr. Bones ReAction figures lineup

PREMIUM ACTION FIGURES: Relive the good times all over again with our ReAction figures, classic 3.75" scale action figure toys that fit in the palm of your hand; Featuring Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, G.I. Joe, Toho, Who Framed Roger Rabbit, and more

COLLECTIBLE TOYS & FIGURES: From TMNT action figures and G.I. Joe skateboard decks to Power Rangers t-shirts and SpongeBob toys, Super7 makes the perfect retro collectibles, vintage toys, and nostalgia gifts for pop culture fanatics and collectors
body.description: Super7's latest release brings back a classic confection in ReAction figure form! This 3.75” articulated Mr. Bones ReAction figure features the skeletal scamp in a patchwork of bright colors inspired by the vintage puzzle candy treat and comes with a tombstone action figure accessory. You may not be able to eat this version of Mr. Bones but this ReAction figure will definitely satisfy your hunger for nostalgia! Super7 makes retro collectibles, vintage toys, and nostalgia gifts for pop culture fanatics and collectors. We grew up with giant monsters, comic books, punk, science fiction, skateboarding, robots, and rebellion. No one made what we wanted. So we made it ourselves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A toy of a skeleton made of brightly colored candy! Yipee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was just as delicious as I had remembered!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So awesome, this is such a great idea for a figure.
reviews.reviewText: This is nostalgic. I remember when my son had these candy box Mr Bones so what a great idea. Very unique, highly recommend. A great toy/figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He's so real!
reviews.reviewText: Yup, I committed a cardinal sin of opening the package so my daughter could play with him. Shockingly I have opened every one of my Super7 toys so my kids can play with them, and it's always 100% worth it!The packaging is beautiful, it really is a shame to rip it open, but seeing my kids play with toys that I can wish existed back in the 80s, is all worth it.Like all Super7 action figures, the fit and finish on this guy is fantastic. Beautiful colors, no rough edges, etc. As some mentioned, Mr. Bones doesn't move as much as the false articulations might lead you to believe. His arms pivot at the shoulder, his legs pivot at the waist, and his head can turn. Not much but it's enough to make him sit and balance him to stand.It would have been fun if he came with a little red plastic coffin like the candy used to come in, but that nostalgia would have been lost on the kids anyway.Bottom line: fun nostalgic memories for me, something I hadn't thought about in decades, and a weird little skeleton toy for the kids to incorporate into their playtime. Absolutely love all things Super7!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: He looks hist like the candy! He has 4 points of articulation: head, shoulders, and hip. He can sit down easy and with one arm out fir balance, he can stand. The tombstone is cute but not necessary. I remember this candy was inside a plastic coffin. That would have been a better accessory. The packaging is nice if keeping hom boxed is desired. Overall, a fun nostalgic figure but the retail price is too high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mr. Bones is awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this guy, he is super cute and friendly. The packaging was fun with the coffin shaped blister, and the card back was printed great. It would look wonderful on a shelf like that. We however opened ours and our little one loves him. The build and paint are great and it is durable, no issues with a little kid playing with him. I was slightly disappointed with the articulation, and I thought his knees and elbows would bend, but they don’t. I was also hopeful that he could be disassembled and reassembled, as the packaging shows all of his parts disconnected, and floating around. Even those those features would be rad, it doesn’t take away from the fun we have playing with Mr. Bones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the candy!
reviews.reviewText: This definitely screams, leave in the package, the packaging is just as cool as Mr. Bones and completes the whole 1970's/80's feel. Mr. Bones is from a nostalgia candy that is no longer made. In candy, it would come in coffin with various colored skeleton parts you could put together. (Of course, there was never enough to make a whole Mr. Bones)Alas! The Mr. Bones Action Figure.While this is far from pulling apart, the look and colors of the original candy is pretty spot on. It is really cool to see a lifelike action figure of a Mr. Bones that will not fall apart. This looks to be slightly articulated. One of the most classic things about Mr. Bones was the heart in the center of the chest and the coffin. The coffin is printed as a picture on the package. This is one of the most randomly great nostalgic toys that you could gift a sibling or friend. Recommend!
